name: Coven - Super Early Alpha Demo
description:
Coven is a retro fps/slasher set in the 1600's in which you play as a young woman who is wrongly accused of witchcraft and burned at the stake. She's resurrected by an unknown force and seeks revenge. 

This demo is comprised of the first level, there are currently 3 enemy types in this level and 6 weapons to find and equip.

I post development updates and progress on my twitter: https://twitter.com/imaenith
